Uses of Interface
datamodel.DataModel

Packages that use DataModel 
Package Description
classifier
A package that serves as a blue print for the development of classifiers.
datamodel
A package that implements interfaces and classes related to saving counts extracted from training data
parser.facades
A package that implements the facades to interact with the parser
score
A package that implements the LL and MDL scores to be used in the structure learning of a classifier

  • Uses of DataModel in classifier

    Fields in classifier declared as DataModel 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected DataModel<T> AbstractBayes.trainingModel
    A DataModel of the same generic type of the classifier with counts and labels extracted from training data
    Constructors in classifier with parameters of type DataModel 
    Constructor Description
    AbstractBayes​(Score score, DataModel<T> trainingModel)
    The constructor for the Abstract Bayes.
    TreeAugmentedNayveBayes​(Score score, DataModel<T> trainingModel)
    The constructor for the TreeAugmentedNayveBayes class.

  • Uses of DataModel in datamodel

    Classes in datamodel that implement DataModel 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  TrainingModel<T>
    A class that implements the DataModel interface.

  • Uses of DataModel in parser.facades

    Methods in parser.facades that return DataModel 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    DataModel<java.lang.String> TrainingModelFacade.getTrainingModel()
    Method that return the DataModel object created and updated after using the methods readLabels and readData.

  • Uses of DataModel in score

    Methods in score with parameters of type DataModel 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected abstract double AbstractScore.calculateScore​(int i, int i_dot, DataModel model)
    An abstract method that must be implement by a class that inherits the AbstractScore class.
    protected double LLScore.calculateScore​(int i, int i_dot, DataModel model)
    A method that calculates a score given a node and it's parent index as well as a DataModel with countings obtained from training data.
    protected double MDLScore.calculateScore​(int i, int i_dot, DataModel model)
    A method that calculates a score given a node and it's parent index as well as a DataModel with countings obtained from training data.
    double AbstractScore.score​(int parentNode, int fatherNode, DataModel model)
    This method calls the abstract method calculateScore to actually calculate the score
    double Score.score​(int parentNode, int fatherNode, DataModel model)
    A method that given a node index, the index of its father and a DataModel with countings returns a double with a score for that particular connection between the node and its parent.
